text_block_list.text: The day of the mock race……More spectators had come than I expected. And not just Narita Top Road's friends――

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: Let's see, how did training go……Oh? Looking a little nervous? Well, it's your first race as a pro trainer after all.

text_block_list.name: Sensei
text_block_list.text: Hahaa, go out there and enjoy it to the fullest! I'm expecting great things from you!
choice_data_list: Don't put more pressure on me……

text_block_list.text: Hearing encouragement from so far away just seemed to put more pressure on me. I took a deep breath to calm myself down.
Since becoming a pro, and since teaming up with Narita Top Road, it's my first race. Considering that, anything more than that would……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Fufuu. I'm getting really motivated. If they're cheering that much for me, then I'll have to show them a good run!
Narita Top Road waved to her friends that came to cheer her on with a big smile on her face.
choice_data_list: Narita Top Road, how can you……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Yeah?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Eh……
I had said that out loud without thinking. There was already overwhelming pressure on her from so many expectations but I might have added another burden.
I was able to keep myself from saying anything more. As a trainer, that wasn't the right way to ask her.
No matter how much pressure I was feeling, passing on that uneasiness to Narita Top Road was――

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I'm completely fine! Besides, I'm happy!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I think that expectations are like a piece of someone's dreams and wishes.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: That they're entrusting their dreams, their wishes, their feelings to someone……believing that they'll be shown a wonderful scene.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: That they're entrusting something that important, to me……that's something amazing, right?
――I had never thought of it that way. I could feel Narita Top Road's words stir within me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Will you try having expectations of me?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Right. That I'll win, that I'll cross the goal before anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san's expectations……will become my strength!
――Dazzling. That was the only word that came to mind. And once again, that feeling of being drawn to her……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah, looks like the mock race is starting, huh. I'm heading out, Trainer-san! Make sure you're watching me.

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: The mock race begins! And they're off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Yeah, looking good……! I'll keep this position……and wait for a chance!)

text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Looking good, looking good, Top Road!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (……cheering. Voices filled with expectations)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Are these a burden for Trainer-san?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Maybe, for Trainer-san, these words don't push them forward, they are something to be carried)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (If that's the case then……I want to help lighten that burden. Because, even while carrying that burden, they still did their best for me)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Will Trainer-san……have any expectations for me? Will they think……that I'll definitely win?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (……I can't hear Trainer-san's voice. I can't hear it, but……)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (But maybe, just maybe……past that corner, beyond that……and even further……)
choice_data_list: Top Road! The goal's so close!!
Top Road! The goal's so close!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (They're waiting for me……at the goal!!)
A voice cried out 『――Do your best, Narita Top Road, you can do it, show them the results of your training!』

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Trainer-san……! I want to show you…… that I can cross the goal first!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I'll live up to……your expectations!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaahhh!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: And they cross the goaaaaaaal!! First place is――!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I……I pushed too hard……!!
……things were perfect right up until the halfway point. However, even after all that training, she still couldn't handle tight corners, unfortunately……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry! Even after all that training……but, but next time! I'll practice more! As many times as it takes.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I wasn't able to live up to your expectations this time around, but if you give me a little time! Then, I'll be better……!
I could feel her desperation. ……But even then.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer-san?
She seemed to be overflowing with motivation and a will to win. Even in this atmosphere…… even after losing, she still had this much spirit.
I was frustrated we lost. I was frustrated but……more than that――

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ! Trainer-san……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah. I'm really frustrated……but, it was still fun!
Right――I want to see more of her, to have more expectations of her. This Uma Musume named Narita Top Road.
It wasn't like the pressure was gone. But now, that was slowly turning in to the motivation to move forward.
choice_data_list: I want to run together with you
I want to run together with you

text_block_list.text: Next time, we'll claim victory.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……
Together with Narita Top Road, G1's wouldn't be just a dream. With a big dream like that, I couldn't help but look forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (……If I'm able to give Trainer-san their first G1 victory……What kind of……)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Smile would they show me?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah! I'll do alot of training! I'll overcome my weaknesses, build up strength, and then……!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely win a G1! Well……I'll win! I'm looking forward to this!
